channel.title: Npc command problems... simple?

item.title: Npc command problems... simple?
item.dc:creator: @a-person a-person
item.description:
@a-person wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:4, topic:347962”]a-person, you can’t have try without catch or finally.

if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("The Provoked")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); sM("You spawn an npc"); } else { sM("No such NPC."); } } catch (Exception e) { } }[/quote]

oh, forgot to copy the rest of the code :S

Read full topic

item.title: Npc command problems... simple?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

a-person, you can’t have try without catch or finally.

if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("The Provoked")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); sM("You spawn an npc"); } else { sM("No such NPC."); } } catch (Exception e) { } }

Read full topic

item.title: Npc command problems... simple?
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

ok, what the heck, I pasted yours in and it gave me 100 errors, then when I pasted mine back in, it still gives me 100 errors…

if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("The Provoked")){ try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); sM("You spawn an npc"); } else { sM("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); }}

Read full topic

item.title: Npc command problems... simple?
item.dc:creator: @a-person a-person
item.description:
@a-person wrote:

if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("The Provoked")){ try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 1), heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0); sM("You spawn an npc"); } else { sM("No such NPC."); }

Try that?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc command problems... simple?
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

Here’s my code,

if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("The Provoked")){ try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); sM("You spawn an npc"); } else { sM("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); }}

for some reason it spawns 2 npc’s everytime. Ex: (::npc 50 = 2 kdb’s)

Read full topic
